turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I want a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What drink can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. What is there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is Cordusio, which is good. It's an espresso with a shot of mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sound good. How many calories are in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are 260 calories in the Cordusio.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's not bad.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What milk is in it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's with a shot of whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. Yes, I'd like that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Would you like me to place that order? What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. To confirm, a venti Cordusio with whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: At the Starbucks at Fort Smith?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. The drink is on order and will be ready for pickup soon. The receipt will be sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK. Sound great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

items.name: espresso with a shot of mocha
